attributes.action: explain why Scottish residents receive free care in later life and Scottish students free tuition paid for out of English resident's taxes but  English people have to pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Scottish parliament has rightly devised a system where old people in care homes only pay for food and accomodation not their personal care.-This is not a  means tested benefit, so does not penalise thrift and means old people are not forced to sell their homes to pay for long term care as is the case in England
Equally Scottish students receive free university tuition,whilst English students are forced to take out loans and get into debt.
English taxes paid by English citizens are subsidising the people in Scotland, whilst English people are denied what should be a basic human right in both cases.
